attributes.action: ensure NICE will allow rheumatoid arthritis sufferers access to a range of anti tnf medication
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NICE are refusing to let patients suffering with rheumatoid arthritis move from one anti tnf drug to another if the original drug fails.
This decision could deny thousands of sufferers of rheumatoid arthritis access to a range of medication which is currently available and could lead them to facing a life of increased pain, suffering and long term disability.
